description: This file defines a React functional component named 'Onboarding' that renders an onboarding carousel with multiple slides, navigation buttons, and user interaction logic.

methods.name: next
methods.description: Advances to the next slide in the onboarding carousel, ensuring it does not exceed the total number of slides.

methods.name: skip
methods.description: Marks onboarding as completed and navigates to the login page.

methods.name: getStarted
methods.description: Marks onboarding as completed and navigates to the login page, similar to skip.
